extendedInfo.description: As reviewed and recommended by Droid Nerds and AndroidTapp!Note: School Scheduler full version has been updated to include Calendar Sync along with import/export. Buy now and save! See full version page for more details https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cryptopone.SchoolSchedulerSchool Scheduler is the perfect app to keep track of your courses, lectures and assignments for the school term. Perfect for university and college students, this app allows you to carry around your school schedule and homework info wherever you go!Paid version with full sync functionality and other features is available from https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cryptopone.SchoolSchedulerFor Android 2.1 and up.Key Features: * Add courses and store additional optional information such as course webpage, email address, office or notes (Notes are for full version only) * Sync functionality (Limited to 1 course in Lite version). Requires Google Calendar to be installed on the device. Check the settings options in the app to see if your device is supported. * Mark days off or cancel individual courses or classes over a period of time. * Add classes to a course with one-time/weekly/bi-weekly occurrences * Import/Export your schedule to other android devices (Full version only) * Create tasks and classes out of existing Google calendar events (Full version only) * Identify classes for a course by tagging them as a lecture/lab/tutorial/seminar/exam (Full version only) * Add tasks to track upcoming assignments or non-class specific chores * Review upcoming lectures and due assignments using the handy day planner * Dates and times are displayed in the device's locale. There's no need to learn new formats! * Choose whether you want classes/exams/tasks to sync to calendar (exams only available in full version) * Localized to German and Polish (based on phone language settings) * Tablet layout support  * Now with light and dark themesNote: Internet connection permissions needed for crash reporting and Google Analytics. Google Analytics is only used in the free version and is not included in the full version of the app.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: very promising, it helps me a lot to organize things on this semester
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: Very well designed, intuitive settings and controls, didn\'t notice any bugs. Good features. Highly recommend for students. Nice work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: Its perfect for what I need, although a widget would be nice so u could just glance at it instead of opening the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost getting there
reviews.comment: This app has great potential. If sync is added and other things are polished up, then I\'ll be buying this app for the fall semester.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad, not bad
reviews.comment: Great app, handles classes really well and is easy yo edit if you make a mistake. Needs to have labs/practicals as a class type though for the science students.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fabulous app for students
reviews.comment: It took me about 10 minuets to put in all my information for the 6 classes I\'m taking in the fall. Nice and simple a clean looking - not too crowded at all. I would like the ability to sort the task by either priority or due date. I really like the lecture feature, it does all I need to view my schedule in a simple, orderly manner. Great app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great, but needs a main feature
reviews.comment: I have entered all of my classes and I can see this being helpful in class, but I don\'t see myself really utilizing this app without some form of calendar sync. I see someone else suggested cloud support, but I think ideally this would sync with Google Calendars (and Google Tasks, possibly?). I don\'t want to navigate a phone menu when I\'m doing homework on a computer!  Great UI though, it\'s really intuitive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but...
reviews.comment: All it needs is a light holo theme, gtasks, and calendar sync and this will be beyond a five star app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very nice app
reviews.comment: Just one thing though, the task list should be sorted by due date, next due at the top of the list, etc.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Has potential. I would like to see a calendar view or weekly view instead of individual day.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great idea but...
reviews.comment: The only way I would use an app like this is if there was also a cloud editor. I don\'t want to have to be entering all the information on my phone, I\'d want to enter the information in a cloud editor (in a web browser) so it\'s with me when I\'m going to class.  Just an idea!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very promising
reviews.comment: Useful now, but the true test will be in the fall. Will update after a few weeks of using it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hi reddit
reviews.comment: Pretty good app verry usefull for students
reviews.author: A Google User
